abstract: Show all tips regardless of their display rule eligibility or display frequency status for UI testing of tips.
overview:
## Overview

This function can also be called with the launch argument `-com.apple.TipKit.ShowAllTips 1`.

Tip statuses automatically revert back to `available` after invalidation when displayed using this override to enable repeat testing of presentation and dismissal.

TipKit’s display override testing functions have the following precedence:

items.description: Show specified tips regardless of their display rule eligibility or display frequency status for UI testing of certain tips.
items.name: showTipsForTesting(_:)

items.description: Hide all tips regardless of their display rule eligibility for UI testing without tips.
items.name: hideAllTipsForTesting()

items.description: Hide specified tips regardless of their display rule eligibility for UI testing without certain tips.
items.name: hideTipsForTesting(_:)

items.description: Resets the tips’ datastore to the initial state for re-testing tip display rules and eligibility.
items.name: resetDatastore()

title: showAllTipsForTesting()
